name: Aaron WISE, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 22nd day of February, 2017, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED,
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

attorneys: Theron Richard Perez, Camp Hill, Jaime Beth Boyd, for Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, appellee.
